document_data.name: Angwile
document_data.mainbody: '''Angwile the Artificer''' was a [[svirfneblin]] inventor and the foremost authority on [[beholder]]s, active before the early 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Angwile was renowned for his research work despite being often considered foolhardy and reckless. He successfully captured and studied numerous beholders, eventually channeling his work into the creation of many highly sought after [[artifact]]s that were always in demand by fellow svirfneblin and other intelligent creatures of the [[Underdark]].

Perhaps the most famous items created by Angwile were ''[[beholder ring]]s''. Each was imbued with magics of one of the creature's eyestalks and improved the wearer's peripheral vision. The true number of such [[ring]]s crafted by Angwile the Artificer was unknown. However, ''beholder rings'' were surely few, as he fell victim to an untimely [[petrification]] in the {{YearlinkName|1009}}.
